post.description: It is the second step to get user authorisation for getting account information or making payments for the respective user. Authorisation key received by previous request has to be sent to get user token in response  to be used in further requests of respective user. Also refresh token functionality can be tried out in here to generate new access and refresh tokens. For that ”grant_type” needs to be changed to ”refresh_token” and ”code” to ”refresh_token”|Ex:userTokenRequest
